name: FreeCell Solitaire - Classic Shuffle Poker Game
name_original: FreeCell Solitaire - Classic Shuffle Poker Game
description:
FreeCell is a game that requires your intelligence and patience to win! You can play it anywhere at any time to entertain and challenge yourself.

Unlike other solitaire games, all cards are opened from the start, and its objective is to build up the four foundations in ascending suit sequence from Ace to King, with cards of identical suit.

Features:
- Simple and intuitive
- Three levels of difficulty
- Smart hints: useful and concise moves
- Effective Help: clear explanation of rules
